---
title: Jaw Jerk Reflex
---

A reflex test that assesses both the sensory and motor aspects of the [CN V Trigeminal nerve mandibular branch]({{< var ref-cn5.path >}}).

# Technique

With mouth slightly open, one index finger on chin, tap w reflex hammer

# Grading / Interpretation

Normal: Slight closure (upward jerking of mandible by masseter muscles) or no reflex

Abnormal:

- UMN Lesion: Extremely pronounced reflex (clearly visible)

:::{.callout-tip}
If you can obviously see it, it is abnormal! 
:::
